summary.para: Returns the list of sector ranges in the form of a safe array of variants of type VT_Dispatch.

param.name: value
param.para: List of sector ranges. Each element of the list is a VARIANT of type VT_Dispatch. Query the pdispVal member of the variant for the interface.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

description.para: Failed to allocate the required memory.

remarks.para: The order of sector ranges in is taken into account during burning. The sector ranges having lower indexes in the safe array returned by IBlockRangeList.get_BlockRanges are written before those with higher indexes.

summary.para: Use this interface to retrieve a list of continuous sector ranges on the media. This interface is used to describe the sectors that need to be updated on a rewritable disc when a new logical session is recorded.

remarks.para: IBlockRangeList is returned by the method. Alternatively, IUnknown.QueryInterface can be called on the object returned by to get the list of modified sectors in the result image represented by that object.
The order of sector ranges in IBlockRangeList is taken into account during burning. The sector ranges having lower indexes in the safe array returned by are written before those with higher indexes.
